sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_VENTILATION(
CORP_KEY, DANGEROUS, LOSS, STEP, STATION, CRAFT,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values(
#corpKey#, #dangerous#, #loss#, #step#, #station#, #craft#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_VENTILATION SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT VIEW_VENTILATION.CORP_KEY AS corpKey, VIEW_VENTILATION.DANGEROUS AS dangerous, VIEW_VENTILATION.LOSS AS loss, VIEW_VENTILATION.STEP AS step, VIEW_VENTILATION.STATION AS station, VIEW_VENTILATION.CRAFT AS craft, dbo.FN_codeToText(VIEW_VENTILATION.CRAFT) as craftTypeName, VIEW_VENTILATION.ID AS id, VIEW_VENTILATION.STATUS AS status, VIEW_VENTILATION.CREATED AS created, VIEW_VENTILATION.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, VIEW_VENTILATION.UPDATED AS updated, VIEW_VENTILATION.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime,
VIEW_VENTILATION.CZYL AS czyl, VIEW_VENTILATION.KSYD AS ksyd, VIEW_VENTILATION.SGAL AS sgal, VIEW_VENTILATION.SSZY AS sszy, VIEW_VENTILATION.SSGZ AS ssgz, dbo.FN_codeToText(VIEW_VENTILATION.sszy) as sszyByType, dbo.FN_codeToText(VIEW_VENTILATION.ssgz) as ssgzByType FROM VIEW_VENTILATION WHERE VIEW_VENTILATION.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_VENTILATION
CORP_KEY=#corpKey# DANGEROUS=#dangerous# LOSS=#loss# STEP=#step# STATION=#station# CRAFT=#craft#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_VENTILATION.CORP_KEY AS corpKey, TB_VENTILATION.DANGEROUS AS dangerous, TB_VENTILATION.LOSS AS loss, TB_VENTILATION.STEP AS step, TB_VENTILATION.STATION AS station, TB_VENTILATION.CRAFT AS craft, dbo.FN_codeToText(TB_VENTILATION.CRAFT) as craftTypeName, TB_VENTILATION.ID AS id, TB_VENTILATION.STATUS AS status, TB_VENTILATION.CREATED AS created, TB_VENTILATION.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_VENTILATION.UPDATED AS updated, TB_VENTILATION.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_VENTILATION WHERE TB_VENTILATION.STATUS = '1'
ORDER BY craftTypeName
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_VENTILATION WHERE TB_VENTILATION.STATUS = '1'

SELECT TB_VENTILATION.CORP_KEY AS corpKey, TB_VENTILATION.DANGEROUS AS dangerous, TB_VENTILATION.LOSS AS loss, TB_VENTILATION.STEP AS step, TB_VENTILATION.STATION AS station, TB_VENTILATION.CRAFT AS craft, dbo.FN_codeToText(TB_VENTILATION.CRAFT) as craftTypeName, TB_VENTILATION.ID AS id, TB_VENTILATION.STATUS AS status, TB_VENTILATION.CREATED AS created, TB_VENTILATION.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_VENTILATION.UPDATED AS updated, TB_VENTILATION.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_VENTILATION WHERE TB_VENTILATION.STATUS = '1' AND TB_VENTILATION.ID IN
#ids[]#
ORDER BY craftTypeName
